food.name: Butter Chicken
food.description: Butter Chicken is a dish of chicken in a spiced curry sauce. It is a dish of the Indian subcontinent originating in the Punjab region. It is popular in India, Pakistan, the United Kingdom, Canada, the United States, and Australia.

food.name: Blini with Salmon
food.description: Blinis are mini pancakes that make perfect finger food for passing around at a party. Top with dill crème fraîche and smoked salmon for a timeless, elegant canapé that never fails to impress

food.name: Wiener Schnitzel
food.description: Wiener schnitzel is a veal cutlet that has been pounded thin, breaded, and pan-fried. It is a traditional Austrian dish that is popular throughout Central Europe and is often served with a lemon wedge and a side of French fries.
